sentences.english: Abdominal pain is suggestive of pelvic inflammatory disease and suprapubic pain is suggestive of cystitis.
sentences.chinese: 腹痛常提示盆腔感染，耻骨上疼痛常提示膀胱炎。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of partial excision of muscoli puborectalis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察耻骨直肠肌部分切除术的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of bilateral orchidectomy using transverse incision in front of pubic symphysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨耻骨联合前横切口行双侧睾丸切除术的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the X-ray findings and evaluate the value of X-ray in diagnosis of stress fracture of the pubic ramus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨耻骨支应力性骨折的X线表现及其诊断价值。

sentences.english: At 12 weeks the fundus becomes palpable at the symphysis pubis.
sentences.chinese: 12周时可在耻骨联合上触及宫底。

sentences.english: Imagine that the sacrum is sinking deeper into the back of your pelvis and bring the tailbone closer to the pubis.
sentences.chinese: 想像骶骨下沉进入骨盆的后侧并带着尾骨靠近耻骨。

sentences.english: Recently, suprapubic pain, are afraid to walk away too fast.
sentences.chinese: 最近耻骨痛，走路都不敢走得太快。

sentences.english: Press your tailbone toward your pubis and turn the upper thighs inward slightly.
sentences.chinese: 尾骨压向耻骨，大腿上部内侧轻轻内旋。

sentences.english: The psoas and pectineus tilt the hip slightly forward.
sentences.chinese: 腰肌和耻骨肌使骨盆轻微前倾。

sentences.english: Lengthen your tailbone away from the back of your pelvis and press it lightly toward the pubis.
sentences.chinese: 从骨盆的后部拉长尾骨，并轻轻地把它压向耻骨。

sentences.english: A caudal ventral midline coeliotomy from umbilicus to pubis should be performed.
sentences.chinese: 由脐到耻骨之腹中线作腹部切开。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of reconstruction plate internal fixation for pubic symphysis separation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨重建钢板内固定治疗耻骨联合分离的效果。

sentences.english: Conversely, the pubic symphysis anteriorly is weaker and more easily ruptured.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，前方的耻骨联合薄弱，更容易发生断裂。

sentences.english: The symphysis pubis only then touches soft and the wide embryo bell.
sentences.chinese: 耻骨联合上方可触及软而宽的胎铃。

sentences.english: Lengthen your tailbone away from the back of your pelvis and press it lightly toward the pubis.
sentences.chinese: 将尾骨从骨盆后方向外延展并轻微的将它压向耻骨。

sentences.english: The Comparative Biomechanical Study of Four Fixation Methods for Symphysis Pubis Diastasis;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨重建钢板内固定治疗耻骨联合分离的效果。
